snippet.title: Summer in Mara - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Take care of your own island and explore the ocean in this farming adventure. Discover the story of Koa in a game that mixes farming, crafting, and exploring mechanics in a tropical archipelago with a colorful style and strong narrative.

Summer in Mara releases on Nintendo Switch in Spring 2020. 

Learn more: https://nintendo.com/games/detail/summer-in-mara-switch/

#SummerMara #NintendoSwitch #IndieWorld

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot
